column1: Funeral Services will be held at 11 am on Tuesday
column2: June 23 in the Chapel of West Cobb Funeral Home and Crematory
column3: Marietta with Dr. Richard Walker and Pastor John Creech officiating. Interment will follow at Cheatham Hill Memorial Park
column4: Marietta.  The family will receive friends on Monday
column5: June 22 from 5 until 8 pm at the funeral home.
